pages.text: At some point, one realizes that a $(item)Furnace$() is just too slow and consuming of resources to use efficiently.$(br)The $(item)Extraneous Firestarter$() speeds up a $(item)Furnace$() it is placed on any side of, along with giving it the necessary heat to smelt any sort of material. Note that, while consuming the required $(aura) for this, the natural levels might drop into the negatives, causing $(l:intro/aura)diminishing returns$().
Creating the $(item)Extraneous Firestarter$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
